title: Timeout
desc:
How long to wait for the AI to respond before timing out, in seconds.
Default is 20.0.

title: Memory
desc:
How many actions and results the AI can remember. This doesn't affect context or memory. 0 or less will use the whole story.
Default is 20.

title: Max Length
desc:
The maximum length of words in the sequence the AI will generate.
Default is 60.

title: Beam Searches
desc:
Number of searches the AI performs to find a higher cumulative text sequence probability.
Default is 1.

title: Temperature
desc:
Lower temperatures make the AI more picky, higher make the AI more sporadic.
Default is 0.8.

title: Top K Value
desc:
Keep only the top K tokens with the highest probability.
Default is 40.

title: Top P Value
desc:
Keep only the tokens with a cumulative probability greater than or equal to P.
Default is 0.9.

title: Repetition Penalty
desc:
1 is no penalty, >1 makes it less likely to repeat words in a given sequence.
Default is 1.1.
